sense.def:
To be involved in a situation or activity
pomeni sodelovati pri nekih okoliščinah ali dejavnosti.

seg.quote: Should religious leaders get involved in politics?

sense.def:
To be deeply involved in something
pomeni, da imamo silovite ali navdušene občutke o tistem, kar delamo.

seg.quote: I was deeply involved in my work.
She became terribly involved with writing.

gramGrp.pos:
PRED ADJ
or
ADJ
after
N

sense.def:
Kadar so stvari
involved in something
, so potrebne za opravljanje ali razumevanje nečesa, na primer dela ali sistema.

seg.quote: There is quite a lot of work involved.
What is involved in making a television programme?

sense.def:
Kadar za določen položaj ali dejavnost rečemo, da je
involved
, hočemo povedati, da je zelo zapletena.

To be involved with another person
pomeni imeti tesno zvezo z neko osebo.
